text:
THE AMERICAN UNIVERSITY
WASHINGTON, D. C. 20016
WAMU-FM
88.5
AFFILIATIONS
NON-COMMERCIAL RADIO
(202) 966-6506
NATIONAL EDUCATIONAL RADIO (NER)
EASTERN EDUCATIONAL RADIO (EERN)
July 10,1968
Mr. Kenneth Clark
National Educational Radio
1346 Connecticut Avenue, N.W.
Washington, D.C. 20036
Dear Mr. Clark:
In response to your letter of June 27, 1968
concerning"Programs for the Disadvantaged"we now submit
the following resume of.- our past and present projects
directly concerned with involvement in urban problems.
WAMU-FM is concerned with what you call
"the crisis of the people left behind." Our programming
reflects this as do our future plans.
Sincerely,
Roger Tenn
General Manager, WAMU-FM
RP:PM
